channel.title: Data Engineering on Bruce Wu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Data Engineering on Bruce Wu's Blog

item.title: Analytics Engineering (dbt + BigQuery + Data Studio)
item.description: When it comes to working with data, many challenges arise. One of the biggest challenges is building a reliable and scalable data pipeline that can handle large volumes of data while ensuring the data’s accuracy and consistency.

item.title: Optimising Data Pipelines for Cryptocurrency Analysis: Airflow, Kafka, MongoDB
item.description: Table of Contents Project Diagram Setting Up the Environment Data Acquisition MongoDB: The Database Choice Python Integration with MongoDB Kafka: Streamlining Data Flow Airflow: Automating ETL Processes Additional Resources Project Diagram Setting Up the Environment Ubuntu 20.

item.title: Create COVID-19 Dashboard by Data studio
item.description: 自己來動手製作的COVID-19 Dashboard吧，本篇將透過GCP雲端服務自動抓取最新的疫情資料，並使用Google的可視化工具Data studio串接來製作每日自動更新的疫情儀表板。 Data source CSSEGISandData/COVID-19 Diagram 透過Cloud Scheduler定時觸發Cloud Functions中部署的爬蟲程式,並將資料儲存至Cloud Storage，並由Data Studio即時讀取最新資料並製作COVID-19即時資訊儀表板。
